official_title: Work Should Not Hurt You: Reduction of Hazardous Exposures in Small Businesses Through a Community Health Worker Intervention
inclusion_criteria:
* workers or owners of small businesses in select sectors (e.g., beauty salons, auto shops) in target zip codes in southern metropolitan Tucson, Arizona
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria: * age less than 18 years or people not employed in targeted sectors
